product_name: REI Ice Spryte Down Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Ice Spryte down jacket offers grown-up warmth, comfort and performance for your little girl's first adventures into a winter wonderland. 650-fill duck down ensures warmth, light weight and compressibility; lightweight polyester shell features quilt stitching to help keep down from shifting. Durable Water Repellent-treated down and shell fabric fend off moisture to help maintain loft and warmth. Full-length stormflap covers the zipper to help block wind and snow; chin guard helps protect sensitive skin from abrasion. Extended length provides added coverage and protection from the elements. Hand pockets warm little fingers with cozy brushed tricot lining. Three-panel hood; tall mock neck; elastic binding at neck, cuffs and hem.
short_description: The REI Ice Spryte down jacket offers grown-up warmth, comfort and performance for your little girl's first adventures into a winter wonderland.
